overview: Leonid Ivanovich - The Godfather. In this world, he loves only two things: to be the Godfather and his daughter Mira. In order not to anger the boss, Mira is bypassed by everyone. Except for Sasha, who knew nothing about the family, and just fell in love at first sight. Now he has a difficult task - not to lose his hand and heart before the wedding.
title: Welcome to the Family
